trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **Registrations** table.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click the **Data** tab and then click the **Registrations** table.

trans-unit.source: In **Registrations**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.
trans-unit.target: In **Registrations**, click the **Script** tab and select **Insert**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **Registrations** table.
trans-unit.target: This displays the function that is invoked when an insert occurs in the **Registrations** table.

trans-unit.source: This registers a new insert script, which stores the registration information in the new table.
trans-unit.target: This registers a new insert script, which stores the registration information in the new table.
